title: Enabling a non-flammable methyl(2,2,2-trifluoroethyl) carbonate electrolyte in NMC622–graphite Li-ion cells by electrode pre-passivation
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00052H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Matilde Longhini, Florian Gebert, Fosca Conti, Andrew J. Naylor
Pre-passivation of lithium-ion battery graphite electrodes allows for safer non-flammable electrolytes to be used in long-term operation with high performance.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
